p:
where MVIC is mean volume of the intestinal content
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage[substack]{amsmath} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage[mathscr]{eucal} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \DeclareFontFamily{T1}{linotext}{} \DeclareFontShape{T1}{linotext}{m}{n} {linotext }{} \DeclareSymbolFont{linotext}{T1}{linotext}{m}{n} \DeclareSymbolFontAlphabet{\mathLINOTEXT}{linotext} \begin{document} $$\eqalign{ & \% \,{\rm{inhibition}}\,{\rm{by}}\,{\rm{using}}\,{\rm{MWIC}} = \cr & \,\,\,\;{{{\rm{Mean}}\,{\rm{weight}}\,{\rm{of}}\,{\rm{the}}\,{\rm{intestinal}}\,{\rm{fluid}}\left( {{\rm{negative}}\,{\rm{control}} - {\rm{test}}} \right)\;} \over {{\rm{Mean}}\,{\rm{weight}}\,{\rm{of}}\,{\rm{the}}\,{\rm{intestinal}}\,{\rm{fluid}}\,{\rm{negative}}\,{\rm{control}}}}{\rm{x}}100 \cr} $$ \end{document}
